original_title: Two earth slips disrupt railway services on Upcountry Line
original_body_lines: Train operations along the Upcountry Line have been disrupted by two earth slips, the Railways Department says.
According to reports, the earth slips have occurred between Geli Oya and Gampola, and Hali-Ela and Demodara.
As such, the Badulla-bound night mail train departing Colombo Fort has also been cancelled today (Dec.10), the Railways Department said further.
